outline.title: CrucibAI vs Cursor vs Copilot
outline.summary: The #1 AI Coding Platform - Competitive comparison presentation showing CrucibAI's superiority over Cursor and GitHub Copilot
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/webdev-static-assets/crucibai-hero-team-collaboration.png - The image shows a diverse group of people collaborating in an office setting, which aligns with the idea of a competitive comparison presentation and the broader market overview.

outline.title: Market Overview
outline.summary: The AI coding market is $10B+ growing 40% YoY. Key players: Cursor, GitHub Copilot, CrucibAI, Replit. Inflection point for AI coding adoption.

outline.title: Competitive Landscape
outline.summary: Cursor: Best IDE UX. Copilot: Most ubiquitous. Replit: Full-stack IDE. CrucibAI: AI platform with 115 agents.

outline.title: CrucibAI Positioning
outline.summary: CrucibAI is the #1 AI Coding Platform orchestrating 115 specialized agents for outcome-guaranteed full-stack development.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/webdev-static-assets/crucibai-hero-developer-workflow.png - The image displays a person working on a dual-monitor setup with code and a 'CrucibAI' interface, directly illustrating the platform's use and positioning.

outline.title: Agent Architecture
outline.summary: Cursor: 1 agent. Copilot: 1 agent. Replit: 2-3 agents. CrucibAI: 115 specialized agents. 99.2% success rate.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/webdev-static-assets/crucibai-hero-enterprise-scale.png - The image visualizes a 'Distributed AI Orchestration Network' with 115 agents, directly supporting the slide's focus on CrucibAI's agent architecture and its 115 specialized agents.

outline.title: Scope Comparison
outline.summary: CrucibAI builds everything: websites, APIs, databases, mobile, docs, slides, sheets. Others limited to code/websites.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/webdev-static-assets/crucibai-hero-speed-certainty.png - The image depicts an 'Idea' transforming into a 'Deployed Application', which visually represents the 'Everything Support' and full-stack capabilities of CrucibAI.

outline.title: Real-Time Collaboration
outline.summary: CrucibAI has full real-time collaboration: live presence, cursor sharing, shared editing, conflict resolution.

outline.title: IDE Integration
outline.summary: CrucibAI supports 4 extensions (VS Code & Cursor, JetBrains, Sublime, Vim). One extension works in both VS Code and Cursor. Cursor: 1. Copilot: 2. Replit: 0.

outline.title: Unique Features
outline.summary: Vibe coding, voice input, outcome-guaranteed, 115 agents, everything support. Only CrucibAI has these.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/pasted_file_EDbwlK_image.png - The image shows a chat interface with a microphone icon and 'Transcription failed. Try again.', which could represent the 'Voice Input' feature of CrucibAI.

outline.title: Quality Comparison
outline.summary: CrucibAI: 9.9/10 score, 99.2% success rate, 98% coverage, 10/10 security. Best in class.

outline.title: Market Positioning
outline.summary: Cursor: Best IDE UX. Copilot: Most ubiquitous. Replit: Full-stack IDE. CrucibAI: Outcome-guaranteed platform.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/webdev-static-assets/crucibai-hero-evolution-ai.png - The image illustrates 'The Evolution of AI' with different stages leading to 'CrucibAI', effectively positioning the platform within the market.

outline.title: Why CrucibAI Wins
outline.summary: 115 agents, real-time collaboration, vibe coding, everything support, 99.2% success, 4 IDEs (VS Code, Cursor, JetBrains, Sublime, Vim), 9.9/10 quality, full-stack.

outline.title: Market Opportunity
outline.summary: TAM: $2B+. Website builders $2B, AI coding $10B, enterprise automation $5B. CrucibAI captures all three.

outline.title: Investment Thesis
outline.summary: Unique tech, proven results, market opportunity, $1B-$2B valuation, Series A ready.

outline.title: The Future of AI Coding
outline.summary: CrucibAI is #1. 115 agents, real-time collab, vibe coding, everything support, 99.2% success. Ready to dominate.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/pasted_file_VAnlqr_image.png - The image shows suggested follow-ups including 'Generate a marketing brief for CrucibAI' and 'Create a presentation comparing CrucibAI's features', which aligns with the call to action and the future of AI coding.
